messages.subject: Harry Potter trivia (was Re: [AlwaysLearning] unbed-timing and cosleeping)
messages.msgSnippet: ... she ... Perhaps I shouldn t mention that the only time we played Harry Potter trivia at home, *I* beat Rain.... ;-) We used to play Harry Potter trivia on
messages.messageBody:
On Thu, 22 Aug 2002 01:07:01 -0700 Joylyn <joylyn@...> writes:
> I asked Lexie what her goals
> were..) anyway, Lexie's goal was to memorize all four HP books, so
she
> can beat Rain (Daron's child) at HP Trivia (Rain beat Lexie, the
> very first time she's ever been beaten),
>
Perhaps I shouldn't mention that the only time we played Harry Potter
trivia at home, *I* beat Rain.... ;-)

We used to play Harry Potter trivia on the Scholastic site together years
ago, maybe that helped? We'd play together and use the books - I think
the game covered the first 3. It was a lot of fun, but now the
scholastic.com site is down so I can't see if it's still there, but if it
is you would just go to scholastic.com, then Harry Potter, then trivia..

And now you've got me yearning for Book 5 again, just when I'd almost
managed to forget...

Dar
